q: Mike Missanelli committed an unintentional violation while interviewing Eagles quarterback Michael Vick on his radio show yesterday. Mike Missanelli reminded Michael Vick that DeSean Jackson made some comments about the quarterback's game-ending interception against the Packers. What's the story with DeSean Jackson ? asked Mike Missanelli `` Is he just a young pup who talks out of turn every now and then and you're the wily veteran now, and you have to kinda hit the pup on the nose?''

. The influential Club for Growth has beefed up his political team, and traveled to both Iowa and New Hampshire. Mike Pence sent this message to supporters on his political e-mail list this afternoon: Friends and Supporters, Over the past few months, my family and I have been grateful for the encouragement we have received to consider other opportunities to serve our state and our nation in the years ahead. We have been especially humbled by the confidence and support of those who believe we should pursue the presidency, but after much deliberation and prayer, we believe our calling is closer to home.

former director of communications said a`` proper goodbye'' to David Cameron yesterday`` Good progress'' is being made towards finding his successor, according to Downing Street. The former director of communications had finished what he wanted to finish . A Downing Street source added:`` It was his choice to leave quietly but he said a proper goodbye to the prime minister and those he worked closely with.'' Mr Andy Coulson is

spark for Detroit after a slow stArt Bell, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento Kings on Tuesday night.`` It was a huge lift off of me,'' Allen Iverson said. I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I'm just excited that I got my first win and I can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb . DEE-ANN DURBIN, Associated Press WINDSOR, Ontario- Chrysler is debating the future of its minivans even as it starts making the 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country this week. We need to completely rethink the minivan, CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made.`` We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile.'' Sergio Marchionne said that could mean new products

Mike Huckabee : Mike Huckabee and his top advisers insist that he's thinking seriously about running for Barack Obama , but he's doing little to put together the sort of organization needed to mount a campaign, href="http://politi.co/hIemD2"> Politico writes. The latest evidence: Chip Saltsman , his campaign manager in 2008 and one of his closest confidantes, has accepted a job as Chief of Staff for freshman Mike Pence Chuck Fleischmann ( R-Tenn.

science fairs? He did it by avoiding almost any divisive social topic. No mention of gun control or abortion, very little on immigration or religious freedom. He cleverly coupled praise for the end of don't ask, don't tell with a demand that colleges open up their gates to the military recruiters and the ROTC. that he's done for me, for the government and for the country,'' David Cameron said. Opposition leader Ed Miliband said his Labour Party had been proved right to question Andy Coulson 's position. Labour has been saying for some months that there are real questions about Andy Coulson 's ability to do his job given the cloud of allegations hanging over him, Ed Miliband said. The government is pushing through harsh spending cuts to tackle a record budget deficit.
